ygData.subject: Re: Lava Bath
ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 9 Date: Wed, 24 Nov 1999 21:31:10 -0800 From: Joe Wallace  Subject: Re: Lava Bath. don t try this at home ... You
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 9
Date: Wed, 24 Nov 1999 21:31:10 -0800
From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
Subject: Re: Lava Bath. don't try this at home

>Blade trap? I saw that "decoration" and didn't even realize it might be a
>trap. So I walked right into it. And nothing happened at all. In fact,
>until someone else mentioned the word trap in-game, I didn't even think
>that
>was what it might be. The next time I was there, I stood under it, and
>still, no effect. I never take damage from it. Has anyone out there ever
>been damaged by it?

You know...that's what I was thinking. I've only been to Sol once...that
time I encountered the blade but nothing happened to me. My buddies say it
hasn't ever hurt anybody but they don't take chances and time it anyway just
in case. :)

-- Lim'Dul
